title: Chinna Chinna Laali Laali Lyrics Theeran Adhigaaram Ondru
stanzas:
chinna chinna kan asaivil
un adimai aagavaa
chella chella muthangalil
un uyirai vaangavaa

mella mella ennuyiril
unnuyirum asaiyudhe
thulla thulla en idhayam
nammuyiril niraiyudhe

laali laali nee en
thooli thooli

unnai alli yendhiye
oru yugam pogavaa
thalai mudhal kaal
varai panividai paarkavaa

laali laali naanum
thooli thooli
laali laali nee en
thooli thooli

kaalai anaippin vaasamum
kadhil kirangum swaasamum
saagum podhum
udhirndhidaathu
vaa uyire

kadhil udhaikkum paadhamum
maarbil kidakkum neramum
vazhum varaikkum
thaeindhidaathu vaa uyire

aanil thaaimai karuvaagum
eeram poothu mazhaiyaagum
kanneer sugamaai imai meerum
kaalam undhan varamaagum
category: Song:Chinna Chinna Laali Laali - Theeran Adhigaaram Ondru
